sentence: Mastriano is running for governor of Pennsylvania, and has polled in second place — behind former Rep. Lou Barletta — in multiple Republican primary polls, as City & State Pennsylvania has detailed.
title: Jan. 6 panel targets key players in false Trump elector strategy

sentence: White is sitting in a crowded primary field that includes former U.S. Rep. Lou Barletta and William McSwain, a former U.S. attorney.
author: Matt Leach
title: Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate gets private sit-down with Trump at CPAC; will seek endorsement

sentence: A Fox News poll released last week found Mastriano vertically tied with former congressman Lou Barletta in the Governor race with 18% support among Pennsylvania Republican voters.
author: George Stockburger
title: ‘Mastriano for Governor’ sign stolen in Lancaster County

sentence: Mastriano, a State Senator representing Pennsylvania’s 33rd District, leads with 16.2% over Lou Barletta at 12.4%.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Governor Primary Poll: Mastriano leads, majority undecided

sentence: Tim Murtaugh, an advisor to gubernatorial competitor Lou Barletta, told the publication that Mastriano’s proposal was a “dangerous idea.” “Directing the government to broadcast the personal medical information of private citizens is a dangerous idea that should never even be considered,” Murtaugh said.
author: Katherine Hamilton
title: Report: Pennsylvania State Sen. Doug Mastriano Wanted Government to Publicly Report Identities of Everyone Who Got Coronavirus

sentence: Former Rep. Lou Barletta (R-PA) is the current front-runner in the crowded field of Republicans running to become Pennsylvania's next governor.
author: Emily Singer
title: Trump Bashes GOP Candidate In Pennsylvania For Failing To Overturn 2020 Election

sentence: State Sen. Doug Mastriano of Franklin County, former U.S. Rep. Lou Barletta of Luzerne County, Delaware County businessman Dave White and former U.S. Attorney Bill McSwain of Chester County turned down the invitation for this week’s debate sponsored by Spotlight PA. An early March Fox News poll of Republican voters had Barletta favored at 19%, Mastriano at 18%, White at 14% and McSwain at 11%, with about 25% saying they were undecided for the primary.
author: Chris Ullery
title: 3 things to know about GOP gubernatorial race debate in Gettysburg
